entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 10:08 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with freezing rain this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
